emergencyPause(string).details: Emergency pause - can be called by designated emergency pausers

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls role

hasRole(bytes32,address).details: Returns true if account has been granted role

isEmergencyPauser(address).details: Checks if an address is an emergency pauser

pauseWithReason(string).details: Pauses the contract with a reason

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused

addEmergencyPauser(address).notice: Only admin can add emergency pausers

emergencyPause(string).notice: Use in critical situations (active attack, critical bug)

grantRole(bytes32,address).notice: Caller must have the role's admin role

revokeRole(bytes32,address).notice: Caller must have the role's admin role
